Title: Pyre
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Robin Veith (written for television by), Georgia Lee (story editor)
Actors: Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham
Plot: Naomi tracks down signs of protomolecule and Fred Johnson's control over OPA collapses.
